metadata.title: CVE-2020-13754 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: hw/pci/msix.c in QEMU 4.2.0 allows guest OS users to trigger an out-of-bounds access via a crafted address in an msi-x mmio operation.

advisory.discovered_by: Ren Ding, Hanqing Zhao, Alexander Bulekov, Anatoly Trosinenko

notes.note: mdeslaur> the fix for this issue introduced a regression, see: https://bugs.launchpad.net/qemu/+bug/1886318

criterions.comment: qemu package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:5.0-5ubuntu4').
